title: A Former Villainess Who Doesn’t Want To See Her Husband Again Even if She Were Reborn - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Lovers Reunited   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Chachaina   ちゃちゃいな
description:
Violet, a selfish marquess in her previous life, forced the third son of a baronet, Soleil, to marry her, whom she fell in love with at first sight

Violet was the only one who thought they had a reasonably good marriage.

After being reborn, Violet is now a commoner and her former husband is an unattainable prince in this life. Violet doesn't want to meet him, but her ex-husband does...?
>
